lead_paragraph: Audi will end its involvement in the prestigious Le Mans sports car race next year after almost two decades to focus on racing electric cars, symbolizing a shift in strategy as parent company Volkswagen battles to recover from an emissions scandal.

headline.print_headline: Audi Quits Le Mans to Focus on Electric Car Racing
headline.main: Audi Quits Le Mans to Focus on Electric Car Racing
